author: chamikara
msg: Changes due to refactoring of Axis2.

author: ammulder
msg: Add a portlet to list, create, and edit security realms
Fix SQL login module to work with PostgreSQL and use consistent column order
SQL login module support database pools in addition to DriverManager
Make some security GBeans implement interfaces and supply references to
each other to allow a caller to navigate them
Change the LM constant from KERNEL to KERNEL_NAME to make it less confusing
Fix the login module list to be in the correct order (GERONIMO-1205)
Management API: J2EEServer can get you to ServerInfo and security realms,
JCAManagedConnectionFactory can get you a connection factory instance

author: brianp
msg: new branch for experimenting with nonblocking reading of requests
